page.title: 20The Well House, Stanway.
page.content: On the way to the zoo from Colchester, there is an interesting house called the{Well House.} The house has a well which is over four hundred years old in the garden, and this gives the house its name. Down the road a bit was a house called Draw Well because the people long ago used to draw water from the well. Next to the Well House was a large field and when the agricultural people came they said that the field next door was the Romans' first place to camp. Now there is an extension on the house which was built about 1975 and another which was put on in 1983.
